items.sentence: How\'s your Christmas shopping coming along?
Tom has been accused of being a jewel thief.
Tom has been arrested three times this year.
Tom has been charged with all three murders.
It was a shock to hear about Tom\'s divorce.
Tom usually only eats oatmeal for breakfast.
Tom walked up to the door and rang the bell.
Tom wanted to know when Mary would get home.
I never heard any details about Tom\'s trip.
Tom will get a chance to do that, I\'m sure.
I wish I could\'ve persuaded Tom to join us.
I wish I\'d been at the meeting last Monday.
I wish I\'d never told Tom that I knew Mary.
I wish Tom could\'ve seen Mary win the race.
I don\'t know what you\'re so worried about.
I don\'t know why Tom didn\'t want us there.
Are you sure there\'s nothing more I can do?
When was the last time you went to a barber.
When you have a minute, could I talk to you?
Where did Tom find it, at school or at home?
